comments.comment: Kenekta nidahase hithala thiranayak ganna nodi hirakaranna uganwanawanam,  agamen ainweema marana daduwama denna tharam waradak kiyanawanam eka pehadiliwama minissu manussakamen, minis buddiyen ethkarana, adaraya karunawa wenuwata wairaya wapurana mandabuddhika pawkara tharsthwadi igenwimak. Mehema igenwim me maha polawen athuga damiya yuthui. Mona rataka mona jathiyaka ipadunath minissu kiyanne thirisannunta wadiyen ithama usas widiyata hithanna puluwan thamanta wagema sathekuta wunath duka,sathuta, wedanawa wage dewal danenawa kiyala therumganna puluwan shakthiyak thiyena sathwa wisheshayak.  Minisata upathinma uruma e uthum miniskama nathikarala hari waradda gana nohitha thaman pita patawana wishwasayakata hira karala anik ayata waira karanna, maranna, hinsa katanna uganwanawanam ehema deyak adahana hemoma lajjawena ona. Uthum miniskamata nigraha nokara amanushika, pahath igenwim mulu lokenma thuran kirimata api okkoma miniskame namen ekathuwemu.
